<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Given an instruction \\p I and DIExpression \\p DIExpr operating on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it, append the effects of \\p I to the DIExpression operand list</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p Ops, or return \\p nullptr if it cannot be salvaged.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p CurrentLocOps is the number of SSA values referenced by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// incoming \\p Ops.  \\return the first non-constant operand</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// implicitly referred to by Ops. If \\p I references more than one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// non-constant operand, any additional operands are added to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p AdditionalValues.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\example</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">////</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   I = add %a, i32 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Return = %a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Ops = llvm::dwarf::DW&#95;OP&#95;lit1 llvm::dwarf::DW&#95;OP&#95;add</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   I = add %a, %b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Return = %a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Ops = llvm::dwarf::DW&#95;OP&#95;LLVM&#95;arg0 llvm::dwarf::DW&#95;OP&#95;add</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   AdditionalValues = %b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">Value &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a99356c6b92999b95181b5d79c03868ee">salvageDebugInfoImpl</a>(Instruction &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, uint64&#95;t CurrentLocOps,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            SmallVectorImpl&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a926d7ce2143863b7a2afda0fca4d2b65">Ops</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            SmallVectorImpl&lt;Value &#42;&gt; &amp;AdditionalValues);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Point debug users of \\p From to \\p To or salvage them. Use this function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// only when replacing all uses of \\p From with \\p To, with a guarantee that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p From is going to be deleted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Follow these rules to prevent use-before-def of \\p To:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   . If \\p To is a linked Instruction, set \\p DomPoint to \\p To.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   . If \\p To is an unlinked Instruction, set \\p DomPoint to the Instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     \\p To will be inserted after.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   . If \\p To is not an Instruction (e.g a Constant), the choice of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     \\p DomPoint is arbitrary. Pick \\p From for simplicity.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If a debug user cannot be preserved without reordering variable updates or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// introducing a use-before-def, it is either salvaged (\\ref salvageDebugInfo)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// or deleted. Returns true if any debug users were updated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9784a018b2dd6a85ee8a70f5f5ab3d02">replaceAllDbgUsesWith</a>(Instruction &amp;From, Value &amp;To, Instruction &amp;DomPoint,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           DominatorTree &amp;DT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If a terminator in an unreachable basic block has an operand of type</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Instruction, transform it into poison. Return true if any operands</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to a basic block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A bitreverse idiom normally requires around 2&#42;BW nodes to be searched (where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BW is the bitwidth of the integer type). A bswap idiom requires anywhere up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to BW / 4 nodes to be searched, so is significantly faster.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function returns true on a successful match or false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6c402f49fa595af618c5ad1500565d92">recognizeBSwapOrBitReverseIdiom</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Instruction &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MatchBSwaps, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MatchBitReversals,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SmallVectorImpl&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt; &amp;InsertedInsts);</span></CodeLine>
